snippet.title: Serene Asylum Trailer 03
snippet.description:
Looking for something spooky to play this Halloween season? Check out the game I’ve solo developed over the past year, Serene Asylum. It’s a psychological horror puzzle game that takes place in an abandoned mental institution. Check out the trailer below:

Play it on steam now 
(https://store.steampowered.com/app/1746870/Serene_Asylum/)
or download it directly on itch.io
(https://supermariobro09.itch.io/serene-asylum)

Thank you in advance for the support! Have a spooky season everyone!
